metadata.description: A once-majestic crystal spire, shattered and overgrown with vines, its peak now lost to the clouds. The air is thick with an otherworldly energy.

atmosphere.lighting: Dim, ethereal glow emanating from cracks in the crystal
atmosphere.sounds: Creaking wind, distant whispers on the breeze

metadata.significance: Birthplace of ancient El Dorian magic, said to hold secrets of the past.
